title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
Introducing the Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels! These paper towels are specially designed to be easily accessible and user-friendly for our elderly folks who may be easily confused. 

With a total of 12 rolls, each pack contains 2 packs of 6 rolls, providing you with a long-lasting supply. Each huge roll is packed with 158 sheets, giving you plenty of absorbent power. The 2-ply sheet size ensures durability and strength. 

Our Flex-a-Size feature allows you to choose the perfect sheet size for your needs, making it convenient and efficient. The white color adds a touch of elegance to your cleaning routine. 

Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels are proud to be recommended by leading brand Bounty Paper Towels. They are up to 75% more absorbent compared to the leading 1-ply brand, ensuring superior performance. 

Invest in the Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels and experience the ultimate combination of convenience, absorbency, and quality. Say goodbye to confusion and hello to effortless cleaning!

With a total of 12 rolls, each pack contains 2 sets of 6 rolls, ensuring that you always have an ample supply of paper towels. Each roll consists of a generous 158 sheets, offering you plenty of cleaning power. These rolls are considered huge, so you can trust that they will last for a long time.

The Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels are made with 2-ply sheets, providing strength and durability during use. They are specially designed to be 75% more absorbent than the leading 1-ply brand, ensuring that spills and messes are effectively cleaned up with ease.

One of the standout features of these paper towels is their flex-a-size technology. This means that you can choose the perfect size for your cleaning task, whether it's a small spill or a larger surface area. Simply tear off the desired sheet size and get to work!

The Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels are available in a classic white color, ensuring a clean and fresh look in your home. We also recommend these paper towels as a great alternative to Bounty Paper Towels, providing the same level of quality and performance.

Make your everyday cleaning tasks easier with the Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels. Trust in their superior absorbency, durability, and convenience. Order yours today and experience the difference!
